00137   std::vector<int> next_samples, current_samples;

00141     // If the next pulse is less than the set number of samples,
00142     // it's a continuation of this pulse
00143     while (next_samples.size() < nSamples) {
00144       current_samples = pulses[iPulse]->GetSamples();
